page.title: 03ENGINEERING ON RAASAY
page.content: NEIL_JOHN'S FATHER HAS A SMALL ENGINEERING WORKS ON RAASAY. HE HAS BEEN AN ENGINEER FOR 25 YEARS BUT HAS ONLY RECENTLY BEGUN ENGINEERING ON RAASAY. HE WORKS ON HIS OWN WITH ONE APPRENTICE.HE REPAIRS BOATS MAKES PEAT IRONS AND VARIOUS OTHER SMALL ITEMS. ONE OF THE ADVANTAGES OF WORKING ON RAASAY IS THAT HE HOPES TO BE NEAR THE CUSTOMER AND ONE OF THE DISADVANTAGES IS THAT HE IS NOT NEAR THE SUPPLIERS OF RAW MATERIALS. HE HAS METAL CUTTING SAWS,WOOD CUTTING SAWS AND VARIOUS MACHINES FOR CUTTING METAL.ALL MOVING PARTS OF MACHINERY HAVE TO HAVE A GUARD TO COMPLY WITH THE SAFETY REGULATIONS. THE WORKSHOP IS ROUGHLY 150 SQUARE FEET IN AREA.THE RAW MATERIALS THAT MR MACLOAD USES ARE IRON,STEEL,BRASS, COPPER AND ALUMINUIM.HE ALSO USES A MODERN MATERIAL_FIBREGLASS.
